objects.description: [Stuxnet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0010)'s infection sequence consists of code blocks and data blocks that will be downloaded to the PLC to alter its behavior. (Citation: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien February 2011)

external_references.source_name: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien February 2011
external_references.description: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien 2011, February W32.Stuxnet Dossier (Version 1.4) Retrieved. 2017/09/22
